requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 or above
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
